controls.label: Size
controls.description: Sets the size of the brush in pixels.

controls.label: Opacity
controls.description: Controls brush opacity from transparent to fully opaque.

controls.label: Brush Color
controls.description: Color used for brush strokes.

controls.label: Size
controls.description: Sets the thickness of the line.

controls.label: Opacity
controls.description: Controls line opacity.

controls.label: Line Color
controls.description: Color used for line strokes.

controls.label: Smooth
controls.description: Draws a smooth curved line instead of straight segments.

controls.label: Strength
controls.description: Adjust the brightness of the image. Negative values darken, positive values brighten.

controls.label: Gamma
controls.description: Gamma correction. Values < 1 brighten shadows, > 1 darken highlights.

controls.label: Midpoint
controls.description: Defines the tonal midpoint for scaling.

controls.label: Localized
controls.description: Enhance brightness locally in darker regions.

controls.label: Clarity Amount
controls.description: Lightroom-style clarity. Negative values soften details, positive values boost local contrast.

controls.label: Strength
controls.description: Controls the intensity of the contrast adjustment. Below 0 reduces contrast, above 0 increases contrast.

controls.label: Midpoint
controls.description: Defines the tonal midpoint for scaling.

controls.label: Localized
controls.description: Apply contrast enhancement locally to edges and textures.

controls.label: Strength
controls.description: Controls the intensity of the desaturation. 0 is no effect, 1 is fully desaturated.

controls.label: Red Channel
controls.description: Controls the intensity of the {channel} channel desaturation relative to the total strength.

controls.label: Green Channel
controls.description: Controls the intensity of the {channel} channel desaturation relative to the total strength.

controls.label: Blue Channel
controls.description: Controls the intensity of the {channel} channel desaturation relative to the total strength.

controls.label: Intensity
controls.description: Controls the intensity of the saturation. 1.0 is no change, below 1 reduces, above 1 increases saturation.

controls.label: Amount
controls.description: Overall strength applied to the high-frequency detail mask.

controls.label: Radius
controls.description: Gaussian blur kernel size (odd numbers give the best results).

controls.label: Sigma
controls.description: Gaussian blur sigma controlling feather softness around edges.

controls.label: Threshold
controls.description: Skip sharpening for pixels below this normalized contrast level.

controls.label: Target Edge (px)
controls.description: Target size for the selected image edge.

controls.label: Fit Longest Edge
controls.description: When enabled, the longest image edge is resized to the target size; otherwise the shortest edge is used.

controls.label: Resample Method
controls.description: Interpolation method used when resizing.

controls.label: Width (px)
controls.description: Target image width in pixels.

controls.label: Height (px)
controls.description: Target image height in pixels.

controls.label: Resample Method
controls.description: Interpolation method used when resizing.

controls.label: Resize Mode
controls.description: Choose whether to crop or pad when matching the target dimensions.

controls.label: Padding Color
controls.description: Hex color used when padding (only when mode is set to pad).

controls.label: Transparent Background
controls.description: Keep an alpha channel instead of filling the background with the selected color.

controls.label: Background Color
controls.description: Used to fill the removed background when transparency is disabled.

controls.label: Opacity
controls.description: Adjust the opacity of the blended layer.

controls.label: Color
controls.description: Sets the solid color that will be blended onto the image.

controls.label: Intensity
controls.description: How strong the bloom reads after compositing. 1.0 = add the blurred highlights at full strength.

controls.label: Radius
controls.description: Blur radius in pixels (odd numbers only). Bigger radius â†’ softer, more cinematic glow.

controls.label: Threshold
controls.description: Bright-pass cutoff. 0 = everything glows, 1 = nothing glows. For dim scenes start around 0.15-0.35.

controls.label: Tint Color
controls.description: Hex color for the glow. Pure white #FFFFFF keeps original hue.

controls.label: Intensity
controls.description: Sets the strength of the film grain effect.

controls.label: Size
controls.description: Sets the size of the noise granularity.

controls.label: Tint
controls.description: Hexadecimal color (default is #FFFFFF for no tint).

controls.label: Soft Blend
controls.description: If true, uses a soft blending mode for the grain.

controls.label: Blur Sigma
controls.description: Standard deviation for the Gaussian kernel. Controls blur intensity.

controls.label: Kernel Size
controls.description: Controls the size of the Gaussian blur kernel. Higher values mean more smoothing.

controls.label: Intensity
controls.description: Controls the intensity of the sepia effect.

controls.label: Intensity
controls.description: Strength of the tint applied.

controls.label: Balance
controls.description: Luminance pivot. 0 = lift even deep blacks; 1 = tint only the brightest pixels.

controls.label: Softness
controls.description: Width of the transition band around the balance value.

controls.label: Highlights
controls.description: Hex colour applied to highlights.

controls.label: Shadows
controls.description: Hex colour applied to shadows.

controls.label: Focus Position
controls.description: Vertical center of the sharp band (0 = top, 1 = bottom).

controls.label: Focus Size
controls.description: Height of the sharp zone as a fraction of the image.

controls.label: Blur Radius
controls.description: Gaussian radius for out-of-focus areas. Higher values mean more blur.

controls.label: Smooth Fall-off
controls.description: Linear means constant fall-off, smooth means gradual transition.

controls.label: Vertical Orientation
controls.description: Horizontal means the focus band is horizontal, vertical means it is vertical.

controls.label: Intensity
controls.description: Controls vibrance. Negative values reduce, positive values increase vibrance.

controls.label: Protect Skin Tones
controls.description: If true, skin tones are less affected by the vibrance adjustment.

controls.label: Clip Softly
controls.description: If true, saturation is rolled off near maximum to avoid clipping.

controls.label: Intensity
controls.description: Controls the darkness of the vignette effect. Higher values mean darker edges.

controls.label: Radius
controls.description: Controls the size of the vignette effect. Lower values mean a smaller vignette.

controls.label: Color
controls.description: Sets the color of the vignette.

controls.label: Circular
controls.description: Selects the shape of the vignette effect, defaults to elliptical.

controls.label: Positive Prompt
controls.description: Prompt applied to the target region.

controls.label: Negative Prompt
controls.description: Negative prompt applied to the target region.

controls.label: Conditioning Mix
controls.description: -1=input only, 0=concat, 1=prompts only. Intermediate values blend between input and prompts.

controls.label: WD14 Tagging
controls.description: Automatically tag the inpaint patch with WD14 and add tags to conditioning.

controls.label: Denoise Percentage
controls.description: Noise applied during inpaint. 0 keeps original pixels, 100 fully regenerates.

controls.label: Sampler
controls.description: Sampler used for inpaint diffusion steps.

controls.label: Scheduler
controls.description: Scheduler used for inpaint diffusion steps.

controls.label: CFG Scale
controls.description: Classifier-free guidance applied during the inpaint pass.

controls.label: Steps
controls.description: Diffusion steps used for the inpaint sampler.

controls.label: Seed
controls.description: Optional seed override. Leave at -1 for a random seed.

controls.label: Upsample Target (px)
controls.description: Detailer path: upscale ROI longer side to this size before inpaint (0 disables).

controls.label: Apply Unsharp Mask
controls.description: Apply a gentle unsharp mask after downscaling the inpainted region.

controls.label: Dilate Mask
controls.description: Expand mask edges before inpaint to avoid seams.

controls.label: Feather Mask
controls.description: Soften mask edges to blend the inpainted region.

controls.label: ROI Padding
controls.description: Pixels of padding around the mask bounding box when cropping the ROI.

controls.label: ROI Align Multiple
controls.description: Align ROI size/position to this multiple. Keeps latent-friendly dims.

controls.label: Auto-align ROI
controls.description: Infer alignment multiple from VAE/model. Disable to set a manual multiple.

controls.label: ROI Min Size
controls.description: Enforce a minimum width/height for the cropped ROI.

controls.label: Positive Prompt
controls.description: Prompt applied to the target region.

controls.label: Negative Prompt
controls.description: Negative prompt applied to the target region.

controls.label: Conditioning Mix
controls.description: -1=input only, 0=concat, 1=prompts only. Intermediate values blend.

controls.label: WD14 Tagging
controls.description: Automatically tag the outpaint patch with WD14 and add tags to conditioning.

controls.label: Denoise Percentage
controls.description: Noise applied during outpaint. 0 keeps original pixels, 100 fully regenerates.

controls.label: Sampler
controls.description: Sampler used for outpaint diffusion steps.

controls.label: Scheduler
controls.description: Scheduler used for outpaint diffusion steps.

controls.label: CFG Scale
controls.description: Classifier-free guidance applied during the outpaint pass.

controls.label: Steps
controls.description: Diffusion steps used when outpainting.

controls.label: Outpaint Amount
controls.description: Expand canvas by this many pixels on edges touched by brush.

controls.label: Feather Mask
controls.description: Soften mask edges to blend the outpainted region.

children.description: Brush configuration for masking and painting.

children.description: Remove the background using rembg with optional solid fill.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"bgRemover_transparent","type":"toggle","label":"Transparent Background","description":"Keep an alpha channel instead of filling the background with the selected color.","defaultValue":true},{"id":"bgRemover_color","type":"colorpicker","label":"Background Color","description":"Used to fill the removed background when transparency is disabled.","defaultValue":"#000000","swatches":["#ffffff","#000000","#ff0000","#00ff00","#0000ff"]}],"layout":[{"id":"bgRemover_general","label":"Background Remover","controlIds":["bgRemover_transparent","bgRemover_color"]}],"defaultSettings":{"bgRemover_transparent":true,"bgRemover_color":"#000000"}}

nodes.description: Basic adjustments such as sharpening and color tuning.

children.description: Adjusts the brightness of the image.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"brightness_strength","type":"slider","label":"Strength","description":"Adjust the brightness of the image. Negative values darken, positive values brighten.","min":-1,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"brightness_gamma","type":"slider","label":"Gamma","description":"Gamma correction. Values < 1 brighten shadows, > 1 darken highlights.","min":0.1,"max":3,"step":0.1,"defaultValue":1},{"id":"brightness_midpoint","type":"slider","label":"Midpoint","description":"Defines the tonal midpoint for scaling.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0.5},{"id":"brightness_localized","type":"toggle","label":"Localized","description":"Enhance brightness locally in darker regions.","defaultValue":false}],"layout":[{"id":"brightness_general","label":"Brightness","controlIds":["brightness_strength","brightness_gamma","brightness_midpoint","brightness_localized"]}],"defaultSettings":{"brightness_strength":0,"brightness_gamma":1,"brightness_midpoint":0.5,"brightness_localized":false}}

children.description: Simulates the Lightroom clarity effect.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"clarity_amount","type":"slider","label":"Clarity Amount","description":"Lightroom-style clarity. Negative values soften details, positive values boost local contrast.","min":-1,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0}],"layout":[{"id":"clarity_general","label":"Clarity","controlIds":["clarity_amount"]}],"defaultSettings":{"clarity_amount":0}}

children.description: Adjusts the contrast of the image.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"contrast_strength","type":"slider","label":"Strength","description":"Controls the intensity of the contrast adjustment. Below 0 reduces contrast, above 0 increases contrast.","min":-1,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"contrast_midpoint","type":"slider","label":"Midpoint","description":"Defines the tonal midpoint for scaling.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0.5},{"id":"contrast_localized","type":"toggle","label":"Localized","description":"Apply contrast enhancement locally to edges and textures.","defaultValue":false}],"layout":[{"id":"contrast_general","label":"Contrast","controlIds":["contrast_strength","contrast_midpoint","contrast_localized"]}],"defaultSettings":{"contrast_strength":0,"contrast_midpoint":0.5,"contrast_localized":false}}

children.description: Reduces the saturation with per-channel control.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"desaturate_strength","type":"slider","label":"Strength","description":"Controls the intensity of the desaturation. 0 is no effect, 1 is fully desaturated.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"desaturate_r_channel","type":"slider","label":"Red Channel","description":"Controls the intensity of the {channel} channel desaturation relative to the total strength.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":1},{"id":"desaturate_g_channel","type":"slider","label":"Green Channel","description":"Controls the intensity of the {channel} channel desaturation relative to the total strength.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":1},{"id":"desaturate_b_channel","type":"slider","label":"Blue Channel","description":"Controls the intensity of the {channel} channel desaturation relative to the total strength.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":1}],"layout":[{"id":"desaturate_general","label":"Desaturate","controlIds":["desaturate_strength","desaturate_r_channel","desaturate_g_channel","desaturate_b_channel"]}],"defaultSettings":{"desaturate_strength":0,"desaturate_r_channel":1,"desaturate_g_channel":1,"desaturate_b_channel":1}}

children.description: Adjusts the saturation of the image.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"saturation_intensity","type":"slider","label":"Intensity","description":"Controls the intensity of the saturation. 1.0 is no change, below 1 reduces, above 1 increases saturation.","min":0,"max":5,"step":0.1,"defaultValue":1}],"layout":[{"id":"saturation_general","label":"Saturation","controlIds":["saturation_intensity"]}],"defaultSettings":{"saturation_intensity":1}}

children.description: Sharpens edges using a classic unsharp mask pipeline.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"unsharp_amount","type":"slider","label":"Amount","description":"Overall strength applied to the high-frequency detail mask.","min":0,"max":5,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0.5},{"id":"unsharp_radius","type":"slider","label":"Radius","description":"Gaussian blur kernel size (odd numbers give the best results).","min":1,"max":31,"step":2,"defaultValue":5,"unit":"px"},{"id":"unsharp_sigma","type":"slider","label":"Sigma","description":"Gaussian blur sigma controlling feather softness around edges.","min":0.1,"max":5,"step":0.1,"defaultValue":1},{"id":"unsharp_threshold","type":"slider","label":"Threshold","description":"Skip sharpening for pixels below this normalized contrast level.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0}],"layout":[{"id":"unsharp_general","label":"Unsharp Mask","controlIds":["unsharp_amount","unsharp_radius","unsharp_sigma","unsharp_threshold"]}],"defaultSettings":{"unsharp_amount":0.5,"unsharp_radius":5,"unsharp_sigma":1,"unsharp_threshold":0}}

children.description: Resize the image by fitting one edge to a target size while preserving aspect ratio.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"resize_edge_target","type":"number","label":"Target Edge (px)","description":"Target size for the selected image edge.","min":64,"max":4096,"step":16,"defaultValue":1024},{"id":"resize_edge_longest","type":"toggle","label":"Fit Longest Edge","description":"When enabled, the longest image edge is resized to the target size; otherwise the shortest edge is used.","defaultValue":true},{"id":"resize_edge_method","type":"select","label":"Resample Method","description":"Interpolation method used when resizing.","options":[{"value":"bicubic","label":"Bicubic"},{"value":"bilinear","label":"Bilinear"},{"value":"linear","label":"Linear"},{"value":"nearest","label":"Nearest"},{"value":"nearest exact","label":"Nearest (exact)"}],"defaultValue":"bicubic"}],"layout":[{"id":"resize_edge_general","label":"Resize (by edge)","controlIds":["resize_edge_target","resize_edge_longest","resize_edge_method"]}],"defaultSettings":{"resize_edge_target":1024,"resize_edge_longest":true,"resize_edge_method":"bicubic"}}

children.description: Resize the image to explicit width/height with optional crop or padding.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"resize_free_width","type":"number","label":"Width (px)","description":"Target image width in pixels.","min":1,"max":8192,"step":8,"defaultValue":832},{"id":"resize_free_height","type":"number","label":"Height (px)","description":"Target image height in pixels.","min":1,"max":8192,"step":8,"defaultValue":1216},{"id":"resize_free_method","type":"select","label":"Resample Method","description":"Interpolation method used when resizing.","options":[{"value":"bicubic","label":"Bicubic"},{"value":"bilinear","label":"Bilinear"},{"value":"linear","label":"Linear"},{"value":"nearest","label":"Nearest"},{"value":"nearest exact","label":"Nearest (exact)"}],"defaultValue":"bicubic"},{"id":"resize_free_mode","type":"select","label":"Resize Mode","description":"Choose whether to crop or pad when matching the target dimensions.","options":[{"value":"crop","label":"Crop"},{"value":"pad","label":"Pad"}],"defaultValue":"crop"},{"id":"resize_free_pad_color","type":"colorpicker","label":"Padding Color","description":"Hex color used when padding (only when mode is set to pad).","defaultValue":"#000000"}],"layout":[{"id":"resize_free_general","label":"Resize (free)","controlIds":["resize_free_width","resize_free_height","resize_free_method","resize_free_mode","resize_free_pad_color"]}],"defaultSettings":{"resize_free_width":832,"resize_free_height":1216,"resize_free_method":"bicubic","resize_free_mode":"crop","resize_free_pad_color":"#000000"}}

nodes.description: Artistic filters such as vignette effect and gaussian blur.

children.description: Blends a color layer onto the image.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"blend_opacity","type":"slider","label":"Opacity","description":"Adjust the opacity of the blended layer.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"blend_color","type":"colorpicker","label":"Color","description":"Sets the solid color that will be blended onto the image.","defaultValue":"#ff0000","swatches":["#ffffff","#000000","#ff0000","#00ff00","#0000ff"]}],"layout":[{"id":"blend_general","label":"Blend","controlIds":["blend_opacity","blend_color"]}],"defaultSettings":{"blend_opacity":0,"blend_color":"#ff0000"}}

children.description: Applies a cinematic bloom effect to highlights.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"bloom_intensity","type":"slider","label":"Intensity","description":"How strong the bloom reads after compositing. 1.0 = add the blurred highlights at full strength.","min":0,"max":2,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0.6},{"id":"bloom_radius","type":"slider","label":"Radius","description":"Blur radius in pixels (odd numbers only). Bigger radius â†’ softer, more cinematic glow.","min":3,"max":127,"step":2,"defaultValue":15,"unit":"px"},{"id":"bloom_threshold","type":"slider","label":"Threshold","description":"Bright-pass cutoff. 0 = everything glows, 1 = nothing glows. For dim scenes start around 0.15-0.35.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0.8},{"id":"bloom_tint","type":"colorpicker","label":"Tint Color","description":"Hex color for the glow. Pure white #FFFFFF keeps original hue.","defaultValue":"#ffffff"}],"layout":[{"id":"bloom_general","label":"Bloom","controlIds":["bloom_intensity","bloom_radius","bloom_threshold","bloom_tint"]}],"defaultSettings":{"bloom_intensity":0.6,"bloom_radius":15,"bloom_threshold":0.8,"bloom_tint":"#ffffff"}}

children.description: Applies a film grain effect for a vintage look.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"filmGrain_intensity","type":"slider","label":"Intensity","description":"Sets the strength of the film grain effect.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"filmGrain_size","type":"slider","label":"Size","description":"Sets the size of the noise granularity.","min":0.5,"max":5,"step":0.1,"defaultValue":1,"unit":"px"},{"id":"filmGrain_tint","type":"colorpicker","label":"Tint","description":"Hexadecimal color (default is #FFFFFF for no tint).","defaultValue":"#ffffff"},{"id":"filmGrain_softBlend","type":"toggle","label":"Soft Blend","description":"If true, uses a soft blending mode for the grain.","defaultValue":false}],"layout":[{"id":"filmGrain_general","label":"Film Grain","controlIds":["filmGrain_intensity","filmGrain_size","filmGrain_tint","filmGrain_softBlend"]}],"defaultSettings":{"filmGrain_intensity":0,"filmGrain_size":1,"filmGrain_tint":"#ffffff","filmGrain_softBlend":false}}

children.description: Blurs the image using a Gaussian kernel.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"gaussianBlur_sigma","type":"slider","label":"Blur Sigma","description":"Standard deviation for the Gaussian kernel. Controls blur intensity.","min":0.1,"max":10,"step":0.1,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"gaussianBlur_kernelSize","type":"slider","label":"Kernel Size","description":"Controls the size of the Gaussian blur kernel. Higher values mean more smoothing.","min":1,"max":51,"step":2,"defaultValue":7}],"layout":[{"id":"gaussianBlur_general","label":"Gaussian Blur","controlIds":["gaussianBlur_sigma","gaussianBlur_kernelSize"]}],"defaultSettings":{"gaussianBlur_sigma":0,"gaussianBlur_kernelSize":7}}

children.description: Applies a sepia tone effect to the image.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"sepia_intensity","type":"slider","label":"Intensity","description":"Controls the intensity of the sepia effect.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0}],"layout":[{"id":"sepia_general","label":"Sepia","controlIds":["sepia_intensity"]}],"defaultSettings":{"sepia_intensity":0}}

children.description: Applies different tones to highlights and shadows.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"splitTone_intensity","type":"slider","label":"Intensity","description":"Strength of the tint applied.","min":0,"max":2,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0.6},{"id":"splitTone_balance","type":"slider","label":"Balance","description":"Luminance pivot. 0 = lift even deep blacks; 1 = tint only the brightest pixels.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0.5},{"id":"splitTone_softness","type":"slider","label":"Softness","description":"Width of the transition band around the balance value.","min":0.01,"max":0.5,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0.25},{"id":"splitTone_highlights","type":"colorpicker","label":"Highlights","description":"Hex colour applied to highlights.","defaultValue":"#ffaa55"},{"id":"splitTone_shadows","type":"colorpicker","label":"Shadows","description":"Hex colour applied to shadows.","defaultValue":"#0066ff"}],"layout":[{"id":"splitTone_general","label":"Split Tone","controlIds":["splitTone_intensity","splitTone_balance","splitTone_softness","splitTone_highlights","splitTone_shadows"]}],"defaultSettings":{"splitTone_intensity":0.6,"splitTone_balance":0.5,"splitTone_softness":0.25,"splitTone_highlights":"#ffaa55","splitTone_shadows":"#0066ff"}}

children.description: Simulates a miniature/tilt-shift lens effect.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"tiltShift_focusPosition","type":"slider","label":"Focus Position","description":"Vertical center of the sharp band (0 = top, 1 = bottom).","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0.5},{"id":"tiltShift_focusSize","type":"slider","label":"Focus Size","description":"Height of the sharp zone as a fraction of the image.","min":0.05,"max":0.9,"step":0.01,"defaultValue":0.25},{"id":"tiltShift_radius","type":"slider","label":"Blur Radius","description":"Gaussian radius for out-of-focus areas. Higher values mean more blur.","min":3,"max":151,"step":2,"defaultValue":25,"unit":"px"},{"id":"tiltShift_smooth","type":"toggle","label":"Smooth Fall-off","description":"Linear means constant fall-off, smooth means gradual transition.","defaultValue":false},{"id":"tiltShift_vertical","type":"toggle","label":"Vertical Orientation","description":"Horizontal means the focus band is horizontal, vertical means it is vertical.","defaultValue":false}],"layout":[{"id":"tiltShift_general","label":"Tilt-Shift","controlIds":["tiltShift_focusPosition","tiltShift_focusSize","tiltShift_radius","tiltShift_smooth","tiltShift_vertical"]}],"defaultSettings":{"tiltShift_focusPosition":0.5,"tiltShift_focusSize":0.25,"tiltShift_radius":25,"tiltShift_smooth":false,"tiltShift_vertical":false}}

children.description: Applies a vibrance effect that protects skin tones.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"vibrance_intensity","type":"slider","label":"Intensity","description":"Controls vibrance. Negative values reduce, positive values increase vibrance.","min":-1,"max":2,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"vibrance_protectSkin","type":"toggle","label":"Protect Skin Tones","description":"If true, skin tones are less affected by the vibrance adjustment.","defaultValue":true},{"id":"vibrance_clipSoft","type":"toggle","label":"Clip Softly","description":"If true, saturation is rolled off near maximum to avoid clipping.","defaultValue":true}],"layout":[{"id":"vibrance_general","label":"Vibrance","controlIds":["vibrance_intensity","vibrance_protectSkin","vibrance_clipSoft"]}],"defaultSettings":{"vibrance_intensity":0,"vibrance_protectSkin":true,"vibrance_clipSoft":true}}

children.description: Applies a vignetting effect to the edges.

lfCode.value: {"controls":[{"id":"vignette_intensity","type":"slider","label":"Intensity","description":"Controls the darkness of the vignette effect. Higher values mean darker edges.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0},{"id":"vignette_radius","type":"slider","label":"Radius","description":"Controls the size of the vignette effect. Lower values mean a smaller vignette.","min":0,"max":1,"step":0.05,"defaultValue":0,"unit":"px"},{"id":"vignette_color","type":"colorpicker","label":"Color","description":"Sets the color of the vignette.","defaultValue":"#000000","swatches":["#ffffff","#000000","#ff0000","#00ff00","#0000ff"]},{"id":"vignette_circular","type":"toggle","label":"Circular","description":"Selects the shape of the vignette effect, defaults to elliptical.","defaultValue":false}],"layout":[{"id":"vignette_general","label":"Vignette","controlIds":["vignette_intensity","vignette_radius","vignette_color","vignette_circular"]}],"defaultSettings":{"vignette_intensity":0,"vignette_radius":0,"vignette_color":"#000000","vignette_circular":false}}
